pages.text: AdminShop is a mod that lets you buy and sell items from a fictional "market" at a fixed price. It has support for co-op through shared accounts. The shop's items and prices are set by either the server owner or the modpack maker.$(br)It is $(l)not$() a mod for buying and selling stuff between players.

There are two ways to buy and sell items, you can use the $(item)Shop$() to manually buy and sell items, while if you want to make an automated setup you may want to look into the $(item)Buyer$() and $(item)Seller$().
